00017 #ifndef _VIENNACL_BICGSTAB_HPP_
00018 #define _VIENNACL_BICGSTAB_HPP_

00020 #include <vector>
00021 #include <cmath>
00022 #include "viennacl/forwards.h"
00023 #include "viennacl/linalg/prod.hpp"
00024 #include "viennacl/linalg/inner_prod.hpp"
00025 
00026 namespace viennacl
00027 {
00028   namespace linalg
00029   {
00030     
00033     class bicgstab_tag
00034     {
00035       public:
00041         bicgstab_tag(double tol = 1e-8, unsigned int max_iterations = 300) : _tol(tol), _iterations(max_iterations) {};
00042       
00043         double tolerance() const { return _tol; }
00044         unsigned int iterations() const { return _iterations; }
00045       private:
00046         double _tol;
00047         unsigned int _iterations;
00048     };
00049     
00050 
00060     template <typename MatrixType, typename VectorType>
00061     VectorType solve(const MatrixType & matrix, VectorType const & rhs, bicgstab_tag const & tag)
00062     {
00063       typedef typename VectorType::value_type      ScalarType;
00064       VectorType result(rhs.size());
00065       result.clear();
00066 
00067       VectorType residual = rhs;
00068       VectorType p = rhs;
00069       VectorType r0star = rhs;
00070       VectorType tmp0(rhs.size());
00071       VectorType tmp1(rhs.size());
00072       VectorType s(rhs.size());
00073 
00074       ScalarType ip_rr0star = viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(rhs,r0star);
00075       ScalarType alpha;
00076       ScalarType omega;
00077       ScalarType new_ip_rr0star;
00078       ScalarType beta;
00079       ScalarType norm_rhs = ip_rr0star;
00080       
00081       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < tag.iterations(); ++i)
00082       {
00083         tmp0 = viennacl::linalg::prod(matrix, p);
00084         alpha = ip_rr0star / viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(tmp0, r0star);
00085 
00086         s = residual - alpha*tmp0;
00087         
00088         tmp1 = viennacl::linalg::prod(matrix, s);
00089         omega = viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(tmp1, s) / viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(tmp1, tmp1);
00090         
00091         result += alpha * p + omega * s;
00092         residual = s - omega*tmp1;
00093         
00094         new_ip_rr0star = viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(residual,r0star);
00095         if (std::fabs(new_ip_rr0star / norm_rhs) < tag.tolerance() )
00096           break;
00097         
00098         beta = new_ip_rr0star / ip_rr0star * alpha/omega;
00099         ip_rr0star = new_ip_rr0star;
00100 
00101         p = residual + beta * (p - omega*tmp0);
00102       }
00103       
00104       return result;
00105     }
00106 
00117     template <typename MatrixType, typename VectorType, typename PreconditionerType>
00118     VectorType solve(const MatrixType & matrix, VectorType const & rhs, bicgstab_tag const & tag, PreconditionerType const & precond)
00119     {
00120       typedef typename VectorType::value_type      ScalarType;
00121       VectorType result(rhs.size());
00122       result.clear();
00123 
00124       VectorType residual = rhs;
00125       precond.apply(residual);
00126       VectorType r0star = residual;  //can be chosen arbitrarily in fact
00127       VectorType tmp0(rhs.size());
00128       VectorType tmp1(rhs.size());
00129       VectorType s(rhs.size());
00130       
00131       VectorType p = residual;
00132 
00133       ScalarType ip_rr0star = viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(residual,r0star);
00134       ScalarType alpha;
00135       ScalarType omega;
00136       ScalarType new_ip_rr0star;
00137       ScalarType beta;
00138       ScalarType norm_rhs = ip_rr0star;
00139       
00140       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < tag.iterations(); ++i)
00141       {
00142         tmp0 = viennacl::linalg::prod(matrix, p);
00143         precond.apply(tmp0);
00144         alpha = ip_rr0star / viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(tmp0, r0star);
00145 
00146         s = residual - alpha*tmp0;
00147 
00148         tmp1 = viennacl::linalg::prod(matrix, s);
00149         precond.apply(tmp1);
00150         omega = viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(tmp1, s) / viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(tmp1, tmp1);
00151         
00152         result += alpha * p + omega * s;
00153         residual = s - omega*tmp1;
00154         
00155         new_ip_rr0star = viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(residual,r0star);
00156         if (std::fabs(new_ip_rr0star / norm_rhs) < tag.tolerance() )
00157           break;
00158         
00159         beta = new_ip_rr0star / ip_rr0star * alpha/omega;
00160         ip_rr0star = new_ip_rr0star;
00161 
00162         p = residual + beta * (p - omega*tmp0);
00163       }
00164       
00165       return result;
00166     }
00167 
00168   }
00169 }
